result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ga: tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.orig: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.html: tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ponchtml: tá sé buille luaṫ ag do ṁacasaṁail a ḃeiṫ tógṫa le himirt ċardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
